mapper.insert: insert into member_dm values( member_dm_seq.nextval, #{dmSender}, #{dmReceiver}, #{dmContent}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, dm_sender as dmSender, s.member_name as dmSenderName, dm_receiver as dmReceiver, r.member_name as dmReceiverName, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as dmDate, to_char(dm_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as dmDateHour, dm_readchk as dmReadChk from member_dm d join member_tbl s on (d.dm_sender = s.member_id) join member_tbl r on (d.dm_receiver = r.member_id) where dm_receiver = #{memberId} order by 1 desc
